thread.title: No Social Security COLA makes life tougher for seniors

title: No Social Security COLA makes life tougher for seniors
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
As a senior citizen living on a fixed income, I am acutely aware of the constantly rising cost of just about everything....
